page.title: 11Events In Hannington
page.content: The main event which unites the vil- lage & attracts people from all around is the country Fayre & Barbeque which raises money to finance the fabric of the church, village clubs & activities & maintenance of the village hall. The event takes place every two out of three years, and traditionally a local farm provides a carcass of lamb/pork, for open spit-roasting. The venue is the Village Green: Sideshows, arena attractions, pony rides, & entertain- ments. Hot snacks, drinks & ices are sold. Various crafts are exhibited in the village hall, by skilled crafts- men & women. There is no entrance fee although Â£1.00 per car is charged for parking in fields close by. This Fayre always takes place in June.
